name: Sample tag labels and event bundles for calorimeter study
description: A sample of tag labels and event bundles commonly used for segmenting data in studies that use a calorimeter chamber.

labels.name: Null
labels.description: Average O2 and CO2 during null period used to calculate offset

labels.name: Infusion Study
labels.description: Infusion period - used to calculate VO2, VCO2, MR, RQ errors during infusion test

labels.name: Short Circuit
labels.description: Infusion period where chamber volume = 0. Same calculations as infusion period

labels.name: Invalid
labels.description: Used to tag data to be removed from summary calculations
